title: Europe eyes America's June jobs report
contentencoded:
The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reports its latest employment data on Friday. What is designed to give insight into the labor market may also guide future interest rates, since the Federal Reserve will be watching -- and so will Europe.

Marketplace's Stephen Beard joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, July 5, 2013
teaser: What is designed to give insight into the labor market may also guide future interest rates, since the Federal Reserve will be watching -- and so will Europe.
